original_title: Sous le ciel lumineux de son pays natal
overview: It happens in, under, through the holes of Beirut, its floating gaps, along gullies from drilled pipes, in the dust of what is left of it, remained, because it is of the past this Beirut we see, of the recent past, filmed in 1995, before the city center collapsed by the war was razed and rebuilt.
title: Sous le ciel lumineux de son pays natal
